channel.title: Miscellaneous on ImpossibleTerminal
channel.description: Recent content in Miscellaneous on ImpossibleTerminal

item.title: Twins
item.description: Write-Up Downloaded both files provided (he.txt and she.txt) Opened up browser and go to a side-by-side comparison checking website: http://diffchecker.com/ Upload both files. Follow the lines of text for differences. The Flag sections are scattered across the text changes. FLAG: PCTF{4wes0M3_sTories_man} Flag is case sensitive.

item.title: Uh Oh!
item.description: Uh Oh! Challenge - Hint (NOT USED) ![Uh Oh! Challenge Hint](/images/patriotctf_2023/Uh_Oh_Hint.jpg) Write-Up Downloaded the file provided (rockyou.zip) Unzipped the file. Zip file contained a modified rockyou.txt file. Opened up browser and visited the website referenced: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/North_American_Numbering_Plan#Modern_plan Reviewed the information provided on NANP requirements. Allowing to rule out any digits and formatting not allowed. Created a regex expression based on NANP and provided phone format. Phone Format: (NPA) NXX-XXXX Regex: '^\([2-9][0-8][0-9]\) [2-9][0-9]{2}-[0-9]{4}$' N character can’t have the 1 digit.

item.title: Welcome
item.description: Write-Up Clicked the Challenge description link (rules) to go to the webpage. https://pctf.competitivecyber.club/ Read through the rules and found the flag in plain sight. FLAG: PCTF{I_h4v3_r34d_th3_rul35!} Flag is case sensitive.
